summary.p: The fellow pastors may receive his exhortation, which many wished to receive in written form.

div.p: To all ministers of the word proclaiming the gospel throughout the fields of Zürich, grace and innocence of life from the Lord.

Receive, dearest brothers and fellow ministers, this exhortation or instruction of ours, which many of the brothers have advised to send to you in writing, since the injury of time has prevented it from being pronounced to you in person according to the solemn rite.
From Zürich, on the day of Charles in the year 1532.
